verses.verse: (A Mikhtam of David.) <S%H8104>Preserve<s%> me, O <S%H410>God,<s%> for I <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in Thee.
I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Thou art my <S%H136>Lord;<s%> I have <S%H1077>no<s%> <S%H9186>good<s%> <S%H5921>besides<s%> Thee."
As for the <S%H6918>saints<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> They are the <S%H117>majestic<s%> <S%H117>ones<s%> in whom is <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2656>delight.<s%>

The <S%H6094>sorrows<s%> of those who have <S%H4117>bartered<s%> for <S%H312>another<s%> [god] will be <S%H7235>multiplied;<s%> I shall not <S%H5258>pour<s%> out their <S%H5262>libations<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H1077>Nor<s%> shall I <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> upon my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H4521>portion<s%> of my <S%H2506>inheritance<s%> and my <S%H3563>cup;<s%> Thou dost <S%H8551>support<s%> my <S%H1486>lot.<s%>
The <S%H9112>lines<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> to me in <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> places; <S%H637>Indeed,<s%> my <S%H5159>heritage<s%> is <S%H9629>beautiful<s%> to me.
I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H3289>counseled<s%> me; <S%H637>Indeed,<s%> my <S%H3629>mind<s%> <S%H3256>instructs<s%> me in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

I have <S%H7737>set<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me; <S%H3588>Because<s%> He is at my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> I will not be <S%H4131>shaken.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H8055>glad,<s%> and my <S%H9202>glory<s%> <S%H1523>rejoices;<s%> My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely.<s%>

For Thou wilt not <S%H5800>abandon<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> wilt Thou <S%H5414>allow<s%> Thy <S%H2623>Holy<s%> <S%H2623>One<s%> to <S%H7845>undergo<s%> <S%H7845>decay.<s%>

Thou wilt <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to me the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H9132>life;<s%> In Thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> is <S%H7648>fulness<s%> of <S%H8057>joy;<s%> In Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> there are <S%H5273>pleasures<s%> <S%H5331>forever.<s%>
